/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, looking down the length of the street. The street itself is flanked by trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. A car can be seen driving down the street, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise tranquil setting. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the trees and gives a sense of depth to the scene. The colors in the image are vivid, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
